column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We also got the seafood paella which was sadly not worth the hype. About 1/3 of the rice was so over cooked that I was worried I may crack a tooth on it
column2: there was minimal amount of meat
column3: and the entire dish seemed to be drenched in butter or oil. I've had delicious paella and this was not it. Also
column4: I was a little disappointed that they don't leave the entire pan at the table
column5: but rather dip out the portions onto your plate for you.
